statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records ORDER BY employee_name DESC, completion_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE 'Safety%'
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT MAX(completion_date) AS latest_completion_date FROM compliance_training_records
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_topic = 'Safety Training' ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, completion_date FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Compliance%' ORDER BY employee_name ASC, completion_date DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE employee_id = 12345 AND training_topic = 'Diversity Training'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT training_title, completion_date FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date < '2019-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, training_title FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2019-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) AS training_count FROM employees JOIN compliance_training_records ON employees.employee_id = compliance_training_records.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name ORDER BY training_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_training_records
SELECT employee_name, department, training_type FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT employee_id, training_type, adherence_status FROM regulatory_adherence WHERE adherence_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_type = 'Safety' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, adherence_status FROM employees INNER JOIN regulatory_adherence ON employees.employee_id = regulatory_adherence.employee_id WHERE adherence_status = true;

SELECT employee_name, department, training_type FROM employees LEFT JOIN compliance_training_records ON employees.employee_id = compliance_training_records.employee_id WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY employee_name ASC, completion_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_records, department FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses ORDER BY required_duration DESC;
SELECT employee_id, course_id, start_date FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50;
SELECT employee_id, training_name, completion_date, completion_status FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT employee_name, department, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT course_name, required_duration FROM training_courses WHERE required_duration > 10 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, completion_status FROM compliance_training_records WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT employee_name, department, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND role = 'Administrator';

SELECT employee_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM employees JOIN training_progress ON employees.employee_id = training_progress.employee_id ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT department, last_name, first_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM training_courses WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT course_id, course_name, description FROM training_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, description, duration FROM training_courses WHERE duration > 5 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT employee_id, course_id, date_enrolled, score FROM employee_training WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY date_enrolled DESC;
